content:
Hi, I'm working on this PR https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/93915, and I have this tidy error:

tidy error: following path contains more than 982 entries, you should move the test to some relevant subdirectory (current: 983): /checkout/src/test/ui

However the tests I added are already in a new subdirectory. What should I do ? Increase the limit ? Move my subdirectory to another subdirectory ?
I have for now increase the limit by +1.
Afaik the limit exists due to github directory listing problems. So moving more tests to another directory may be necessary if the current limit includes no margin.
